Detailed Description

template<typename P1, typename P2 = P1>
struct geometry::strategy::distance::pythagoras< P1, P2 >

Strategy functor for distance point to point: pythagoras.

Template parameters:
  • P1 first point type
  • P2 optional, second point type, defaults to first point type
Concepts for P1 and P2:
  • specialized point_traits class
